function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Covid-19 has changed the perception of home space and created new preferences in the real estate market.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The pandemic has highlighted the shortcomings of cities and provided an opportunity for sustainability-oriented design.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and airflow in residential spaces leading to increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial design leading to overcrowding and close contact among residents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient separation of different zones within homes leading to cross-contamination among different areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor air quality contributing to increased number of deaths","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of viruses through bioaerosols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 in the air and on surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient treatment of outside air in hvac systems may lead to the escape of microscopic particles, including covid-19 viruses, into treated air, posing a risk of infection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study of air conditioners and their relationship to the global pandemic may uncover risks related to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indoor air pollution contributing to the spread of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to indoor pollutants as a result of poor ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between air pollution and virus spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 can be transmitted by inhaling the virus from more than one and a half meters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of particles from infected individuals throughout a room or indoor location.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosols remaining in the air after a person leaves a room, potentially remaining airborne for hours.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambient aerosol pollution reduction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of hvac systems on the spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of information and errors leading to rapid and turbulent increase in spread of epidemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Characteristics of covid-19 threatening humanity due to its survival on different materials for hours and days","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Doubts and lack of information leading to uncertainty about the contribution of hvac systems to the spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 through hvac systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the transmission of infection through air circulation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistency in virus survival due to environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through the air and contaminated surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of sars-cov-2 in air conditioning systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heat stress in non-air-conditioned places","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Controversy regarding air as a vector for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through the air due to airborne transmission of particles less than 5 µm in size","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of air pollution on viral infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures during evacuation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 due to aerosol droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of routine disinfection and ventilation in occupied rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of protective measures face masks, social distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased frequency of covid-19 infection in cold and dry conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 in outdoor air between neighboring apartments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fan-assisted natural ventilation increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term exposure to low viral concentration in high-density residential neighborhoods","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in air samples collected from patient’s rooms in hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of indoor surfaces and air with covid-19 virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High viral loads found in specific areas like toilets, bathrooms, and staff areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within a community due to shared building infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased airflow speed in pipes due to toilet flushing transmitting covid-19 between apartments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through air conditioning systems with centrally distributed air ducts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of covid-19 in centrally conditioned hospital air ducts","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of coronavirus through air conditioning systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 infection spread due to poor ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air and surfaces in healthcare facilities and nursing homes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hvac system’s role in spreading infected droplets in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
